symbols.name: sap.ui.export
symbols.description: UI5 library: sap.ui.export - document export utilities

symbols.name: sap.ui.export.EdmType
symbols.description: EDM data types for document export.

symbols.name: sap.ui.export.ExportUtils
symbols.description: Utilities related to export to enable reuse in integration scenarios (e.g. tables).

context.name: context

version.name: version
version.description: Application version that was used to create this XLSX

title.name: title
title.description: Title of the XLSX document (NOT the file name)

modifiedBy.name: modifiedBy
modifiedBy.description: User context for the exported document

sheetName.name: sheetName
sheetName.description: The name of the data sheet that will be shown in Excel

metaSheetName.name: metaSheetName
metaSheetName.description: The name of the metadata sheet that will be shown in Excel

metainfo.name: metainfo
metainfo.description: Optional Metadata that will be displayed in the additional Metadata Sheet

context.description: Export context that will be applied to the exported file

hierarchyLevel.name: hierarchyLevel
hierarchyLevel.description: Optional name of the property that contains hierarchy level information

dataSource.name: dataSource
dataSource.description: Source of spreadsheet data. A JSON array, data source properties map or URL to an OData source can be provided. For example, "someUrl" is an equivalent to {dataUrl:"someUrl", type:"OData"}.

count.name: count
count.description: The maximal number of records to export

worker.name: worker
worker.description:
Run export process in a worker thread. Set to false to disable worker and run export in a main thread. This is needed, for example, if a mock server is used to provide spreadsheet data.
Note: In case of a strict content security policy, it is not always possible to create an export worker. In this case, export runs in a main thread disregarding the worker value.

fileName.name: fileName
fileName.description: Optional file name for the exported file

showProgress.name: showProgress
showProgress.description: Set to false to suppress the progress dialog

events.name: beforeSave

data.name: data
data.description: The data parameter contains the generated file

events.description: The 'beforeSave' event is fired just before the generated file is saved to the file system.

methods.name: attachBeforeSave

returnValue.description: - Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: oData
parameters.description: An application-specific payload object that will be passed to the event handler along with the event object when firing the event

parameters.name: fnHandler
parameters.description: The function to be called when the event occurs

parameters.name: oListener
parameters.description: Context object to call the event handler with. Defaults to this sap.ui.export.Spreadsheet itself

methods.description:
Attaches event handler fnFunction to the {@link sap.ui.export.Spreadsheet beforeSave} event of this sap.ui.export.Spreadsheet.
When called, the context of the event handler (its this) will be bound to oListener if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this sap.ui.export.Spreadsheet itself.
This event is fired just before the generated file is saved to the file system.

methods.name: build

returnValue.description: Promise object. You may use it to track the result of the export process.

methods.description: Loads data from the backend, builds and saves the resulting spreadsheet file. You can use the cancel method to stop a running export.

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Cancels a running export process. This method does nothing if no export is running.

methods.name: detachBeforeSave

returnValue.description: - Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: fnHandler
parameters.description: The function to be called, when the event occurs

parameters.name: oListener
parameters.description: Context object on which the given function had to be called

methods.description:
Detaches event handler fnFunction from the {@link sap.ui.export.Spreadsheet beforeSave} event of this sap.ui.export.Spreadsheet.
The passed function and listener object must match the ones used for event registration.

methods.name: extend

parameters.name: sClassName
parameters.description: Name of the class being created

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata

methods.description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.ui.export.Spreadsheet with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.base.EventProvider.extend}.

methods.name: getMetadata
methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.ui.export.Spreadsheet.

methods.name: onprogress

parameters.name: iProgress
parameters.description: A number between 0 and 100 indicates the export progress in percent

methods.description: Progress callback. The function is called when the progress status changes.
